Gold.en: An attack that may poison the foe.

Silver.en: An attack that may poison the foe.

Crystal.en: An attack that may poison the foe.

Ruby.en: An exhaust-gas attack that may also poison.
Ruby.de: Angriff mit Gas. Gegner wird evtl. vergiftet.
